title: Truth
verses: John 14:6 (WEB) — "Jesus said to him, “I am the way, the truth, and the life. No one comes to the Father, except through me.”"
John 8:31-32 (WEB) — "If you remain in my word, then you are truly my disciples. You will know the truth, and the truth will make you free."
John 17:17 (WEB) — "Sanctify them in your truth. Your word is truth."
Psalm 119:160 (WEB) — "All of your words are truth. Every one of your righteous ordinances endures forever."
Ephesians 4:15 (WEB) — "But speaking truth in love, we may grow up in all things into him, who is the head, Christ;"
body: Truth is a Person and a path. Abide in Christ’s word and you will be formed in freedom. Speak the truth in love so that others may grow toward Him as well.
prayer: God of truth, anchor me in Your Word and make me a person of truthful love. Guard me from deception and set me free to follow Jesus fully. Amen.
